alert.note: Alert for Northwest Deserts, Northwest Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued July 07 at 2:26PM MST until July 09 at 8:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR MOHAVE COUNTY... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT SUNDAY FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR PARTS OF SOUTHERN NEVADA AND MOHAVE COUNTY... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY... The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect from Sunday morning through Sunday evening. * TIMING...Until 8 pm MST this evening. * WIND...South to southwest wind 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * HUMIDITY...Minimum humidity 5 to 10 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will have the potential to spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is highly discouraged. Area fuels are near or at critical dryness levels further contributing to the high risk of fire danger.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now...or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior. A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
